text: A wolf was chosen king among his fellow wolves and he enacted a law ordering that what each one caught in the hunt, he put in common and distributed equally among all; thus the wolves would no longer have to devour each other in times of famine. And an ass that stood by heard him, and waved his ears, and said to him, Great idea hath sprung out of thy heart; but why hast thou hidden all thy spoil in thy cave? Take it to your community and distribute it as you have decreed. The wolf, discovered and confused, abrogated his law. Set an example and follow your own rules.
title: El lobo y el asno
author: nan Esopo
